wordpressPage.title: The Last Supper
wordpressPage.content:
A themed session taking young people through the last supper as an Easter reflection

Suitable For Ages 14 upwards

Required: Cross, spot lights, candles, projector, passion of the Christ DVD or similar, Bread, wine/blackcurrant, cups for communion, quiet background music, Doritos and dips, weakest disciple video

Extra Files Needed (i.e. worksheets etc): The Weakest Disciple – Youtube – click to download

Session Plan

Because the session plan involves diagrams we have got it to download as a pdf so please use the link which is found here
